          <title>
            <string language="sl">Pinkponk</string>
            <string language="en">Pingpong</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pingpong</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pingpong</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pingpong</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pingpong</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντισφαίριση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pingpong</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Električni pinkponk med dvema nasprotno nabitima ploščama in filmski posnetek delovanja.</string>
            <string language="en">Electric ping-pong between two oppositely charged plates. Also real-life video of effect is available.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">naboj</string>
            <string language="en">charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">prenos naboja</string>
            <string language="en">charge exchange</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ping pong</string>
            <string language="en">ping pong</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">jacob</string>
            <string language="en">jacob</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrischer Ping-pong zwischen zwei gegenüber 
belasteten Platten. Auch real-life Bildschirm des Effektes ist 
vorhanden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ping-pong électrique entre deux plats à 
l'opposé chargés. En outre le vidéo réel de l'effet est 
disponible.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ping-pong elétrico entre duas placas oposta 
carregadas. Também o vídeo real-life do efeito está 
disponível.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ping-pong elettrico fra due piastre in modo 
opposto caricate. Egualmente il video in vivo di effetto è 
disponibile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρική αντισφαίριση μεταξύ δύο oppositely 
χρεωμένων πιάτων. Επίσης το πραγματικό βίντεο της 
επίδρασης είναι διαθέσιμο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ping-pong eléctrico entre dos placas opuesto 
cargadas. También el vídeo de la vida real del efecto está 
disponible.</string>
          </description>
